name: Thersanom: The Hidden Secret
description:
Abigail, a seventeen-year-old girl, wakes up on a beach in a faraway country called Thersanom that is unknown to humans.

It’s a world where all the magical creatures humans don’t believe in exist, mermaids, unicorns, pegasus, fairies… 

And then there is one that even humans have never heard of, Enfals, the ones with the pointy ears and the golden-colored eyes, that reminded Abigail of elves. This creature is what Tarran and Ryllae belong to, the enfals that Abigail soon comes to meet.

Abigail soon learns that her getting to Thersanom is a thing that should be impossible because the mermaids make sure humans and the non-magical creatures cannot get to Thersanom, and so she wishes to find out why she got there, and her memory loss is not very helpful.

Days after getting to Thersanom, Tarran's father had gone missing, and they quickly came to know that because of a secret he had been holding, the dangerous enfals of Isdar had taken him.

And so the group went on an adventure of finding Tarran's father and on the way Abigail learned a lot about Thersanom.

FEATURES:
  • approx 1 hour of reading
  • A kinetic story with no choices or alternate endings
  • custom character and event art
  • A fantasy story with magical creatures
CREDITS:
  • Story and coding by FairyKelly
  • Character art by Yakuchi and Elvislis
  • Background art by Kronbits and QQQnoQnoQ
  • Music by Eric Matyas
